title: Neil Lane Talks ‘Bachelor’ Rings and Bling
description:
The one and only Neil Lane sits down with Rachel and her guest co-host, Becca Kufrin. Neil opens up about creating jewelry for Hollywood royalty, how his journey with “The Bachelor” franchise began, and so much more. This is one interview you won’t want to miss. 

Be sure to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.

Thanks to our sponsors:

ThirdLove: ThirdLove.com/Bachelor

Door Dash: Download the Door Dash app/ code BACHELOR

Article: Article.com/BHH
